dmca.title: [ABUSE] Fraud site - www.online-traderservices.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, January 26, 2005 8:39 AM
To: babbey@escrow.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Fraud site - www.online-traderservices.com

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1



Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Brandon Abbey <babbey@escrow.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>, <legal@theplanet.com>
Date: Tuesday, January 25, 2005, 6:36:35 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] Fraud site - www.online-traderservices.com

===8<==============Original message text===============
It appears you are hosting a fraud site at -
www.online-traderservices.com <http://www.online-traderservices.com/>



This notice is provided in accordance with the U.S. Digital Millennium
Copyright Act. The undersigned is authorized to act on behalf of
Escrow.com and its affiliated licensed escrow services provider,
Internet Escrow Services ("IES").  It has been brought to our attention
that your company provides services to a website,
www.online-traderservices.com <http://www.online-traderservices.com/>
which is infringing on Escrow.com's intellectual property rights to the
material posted on Escrow.com (www.Escrow.com <http://www.escrow.com/>
).  They have copied content from our site and are claiming an
affiliation with our companies.



Following is a direct link to one of the offending pages of the
www.online-traderservices.com <http://www.online-traderservices.com/>
site, http://www.online-traderservices.com/terms.php  Neither Escrow.com
nor IES has any affiliation with www.online-traderservices.com
<http://www.online-traderservices.com/>  , and has a good faith belief
that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized
by the copyright owner, its agent or the law.



The information contained in this notice is accurate, and under penalty
of perjury, this office is authorized to act on behalf of Escrow.com.











Brandon W. Abbey

Managing Director

Escrow.com

16275 Laguna Canyon Road

Irvine, CA  92618

Direct - 949-790-5880

Fax - 949-790-5811




===8<===========End of original message text===========
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFB96udvK/XpJs6oyURAir2AJ9hW1DThfGBaYD3WMhqhWjAmGLA1gCgk3pa
+nH9zCLTr6m5x/C/51qyFSU=
=p/Y7
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
